Gas Station Before.intro: Gas stations, modern refueling hubs for vehicles, offer various fuel options, including gasoline, diesel, and electric charging. Equipped with convenience stores, restrooms, and car wash facilities, they ensure seamless customer experience. Adhering to stringent safety measures, these stations serve as crucial nodes in the transportation network.

Office of President Before.intro: The president, as the highest executive, leads the government and often serves as the head of state. Their powers can range from appointing officials to commanding the armed forces. The election process varies, with the president chosen either directly by the people or through an electoral college or legislative body.
